title: URF funtimes. Sunday evening.
body:
Heya peeps. I'm around for the next few hours on NA. Anyone interested in playing some URF customs? Bring your funtimes. ^_^

FINISHED. GG all. :D

http://images1.memedroid.com/images/UPLOADED8/505e15aa36317.jpeg

replies.body: Game 1 full. More games to come. :)
Finished for now. GG all, thanks for playing. :D

So I completely understand why URF isn't a permanent game mode but as far as a featured game mode that you could make to kind of hold over URF fanatics until next year that would still be interesting is to release URF only towers, jungle camps, and minions all have double health and deal double damage. Basically it would be kind of a mix between URF and regular league in the since that it would have fast paced team fights without making champions over powered when it comes to taking objectives. In a certain since it would combine URF and NURF since champions aren't any tankier so the double damage would make it easier to die to things other than champions and getting objectives would be slower but it would have the action filled fights everyone loves in URF.
Thanks for the games! (Free-for-all Crystal Scar :D)
